name: Lesson Plus
description:
"Just the thought of humans not knowing basic math makes me go insane!"

You play as a math professor teaching students about addition. You're so passionate about math that you can't stand the fact that people don't know math, making you lose your sanity. You ask a question and the students have the answer. You have to choose the correct answer to gain some sanity, but be careful; a wrong answer can cause you to lose more sanity. Rinse and repeat until the class is over.

Can you complete your lesson without going insane?

Controls:

- Mouse: Move and click
